headline: Roper Technologies to present at TD Cowen Technology Conference
summary: SARASOTA, Fla., May 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Roper Technologies, Inc. (Nasdaq: ROP) announced that it is presenting at the TD Cowen 53rd Annual Technology, Media & Telecom Conference on Thursday, May 29, 2025 at 9:05 AM (Eastern Time) in New York, NY. A link to the webcast presentation will be available in the “Investors” section of the Company’s website at www.ropertech.com.
